name: Exam Code - U1ALO
document_links: https://ugvcl.com/public/uploads/5/ INSTRUCTIONS TO CANDIDATES - ASSISTANT LAW OFFICER.pdf

details.test_description: Multiple Choice Questions (MCQ). Each question carries 01 mark and there shall be no negative marking.
details.instructions: All questions shall be answered on OMR sheet only. Candidates are advised not to fold, wrinkle, or tear the OMR sheet under any circumstances.

name: Gujarat Urja Vikas Nigam Limited
event_type: Appointment of Liaison Officers in GUVNL & subsidiary companies as per the Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act - 2016
details: Gujarat Urja Vikas Nigam Limited, Vadodara, has appointed Liaison Officers for the rights of persons with disabilities as per the Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act - 2016.

details.Objectives: The UG Vellore Engineering College Ltd, Chennai (UrvCL) is conducting the 5th UG Annual Convocation and 20th convocation of PG Admissions.
